django_tests: Test that the home page view returns a 200 status code.
Test that the about page view returns a 200 status code.
Test that the contact page view returns a 200 status code on GET requests.
Test that a proper POST request to the contact page submits the form, triggers send_contact_notification, and redirects with a success message.
Test that the dashboard view redirects an unauthenticated user (login required).
Test that the home services page (services:home_services) returns a 200 status code.
Test that the business services page (services:business_services) returns a 200 status code.
Test that the book service view requires login and returns a 200 status code when accessed by an authenticated user.
Test that the payment view renders correctly and handles valid booking IDs.
Test that the Stripe API endpoint (create_payment_intent) returns a valid client secret in its JSON response.
Test that the send_contact_notification utility function constructs and sends an email with the correct subject and body.
Test that the template context includes the Google Analytics tracking ID.
